Detailed Description

base class for all processors processors cannot be copied and exist as shared_ptr only
  • there are service objects (deriving from processor::service_base) which carry information over the current epoch and the environment
  • so-called results (deriving from processor::result_base) can be inserted into and be obtained from the service object
